document.full_text: a man who shot dead two convenience store workers in a robbery in 1989 is due to be executed by lethal injection on tuesday, the first prisoner to be put to death by arizona this year.
document.title: arizona set to execute convicted killer
lines_and_colors: a man who shot dead two convenience store workers in a robbery in 1989 is due to be executed by lethal injection on tuesday, the first prisoner to be put to death by arizona this year.
